abilities.description: The user completely encases themselves in a ball of hardened wax, creating a defensive shield that can protect against extreme conditions such as stomach acid. This demonstrates a defensive application of the Doru Doru no Mi.
abilities.limitations: While protected inside the ball, the user has limited mobility and awareness of their surroundings.

abilities.description: The user can create precise wax replicas of objects like keys, duplicating their exact shape and function. The wax is hard enough to function as a working key.
abilities.limitations: Requires knowledge of the object's exact shape to create an accurate replica.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
weaknesses.description: Mr. 3 needed to protect himself in a wax ball when inside the Bananawani because Devil Fruit users cannot swim and are vulnerable in water.

reveals.information: The Doru Doru no Mi can be used defensively by creating a protective wax ball around the user
The wax can be shaped into functional replicas of tools and objects like keys
